## Document.hasPresence() method

`hasPresence` returns whether the given clientID has a presence or not.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
hasPresence(clientID: ActorID): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  clientID | [ActorID](./yorkie-js-sdk.actorid.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
